long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension to convert between Kurdish scripts, from Persian-Arabic script to Latin (Hawar) script and vice versa!

How to use?
On a web page with Kurdish text, either double click on a word, or select a complete sentence or paragraph, that you want to be converted to a different script. 

When converting from Persian-Arabic script to Hawar script, you can choose how to deal with the letters  (ڕ,ڵ,ح,غ) during the conversion. You can replace those letters with either one of the following letter combinations:
1.  (ř ɫ ḧ ẍ)
2.  (rr ll hh gh)
3. (r l h x)

When converting from Hawar script to the Persian-Arabic script, you can choose how to deal with (ch gh hh sh ll rr) during the conversion. You can replace those letters with either one of the following letter combinations:
1. (چ غ ح ش ڵ ڕ)
2. (جه‍ گه‍ هه‍ سه‍ لل رر)

You can copy the converted text by clicking on it. 

This extension would not have been possible without the work of Aso Mahmudi 
(https://kurdinus.com/2019/Transliterate.html).
